divs: sighting detailswhile out side smoking i like to look up at the stars. i saw some thing very very out of place! i saw a neon blue\white lite flickering so i watched it to see if it was a plane but it never moved!the lights went out then it started flashing a rang of colors red,orange,and neon yellow that lasted approxmatly 1-2min. it then went dark and the blue\white light came back. i know it wasnt a plane because there was no sound or movement. i have been looking for it for a few weeks some times it stays a red\orange then sometimes its the blue\white.i have been seeing the lights off and on for about a month. the most recent was tonight.it is always in the same spot. which is above the train tracks and\or the james river. i was shocked to see a ufo that close to home.after i finished smoking i went back inside and thought nothing more about it. ufo's and the idea of alien life it not a fary tale god made the whole universe and we are but a small part of it and when the aliens decid to make contact with us i hope they come in peace!!!
Summary: glowing blue/white light that changes to a orange red flashing light
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Lynchburg
There were no other sightings in Lynchburg on or around January 26th 2010
